identity.name: Neo-Pop POS
identity.description: A point-of-sale system that feels like a toy but works like a tank. High contrast, chunky interactive elements, and color-coded categories for instant recognition.

pos_screen.cart_area: col-span-4 bg-white rounded-2xl border-2 border-slate-200 p-6 flex flex-col h-full shadow-lg

bento_grid.item: relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border-2 border-transparent hover:border-violet-500 transition-all duration-200 bg-white flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4 cursor-pointer group

buttons.primary: bg-violet-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg shadow-[0px_4px_0px_0px_#5b21b6] active:shadow-none active:translate-y-[4px] transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border-2 border-slate-200 font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg shadow-[0px_4px_0px_0px_#cbd5e1] active:shadow-none active:translate-y-[4px] transition-all hover:bg-slate-50
buttons.category_pill: px-4 py-2 rounded-full font-bold text-sm transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95

cards.product: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 p-4 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow flex flex-col gap-2
cards.stat: bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Tactile' feel: Buttons should physically move down when clicked (using translate-y and shadow manipulation).
Use the 'Bento Grid' for the main POS product selection area.
Ensure the Cart is always visible and 'Sticky' on the right side.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings to give it a friendly, modern cafe vibe.
For the Admin Dashboard, use a cleaner, high-density table layout but keep the colorful category badges.
The '9 Top Products' should be populated using the images provided in 'image_urls'.
Strictly follow the color coding for categories: Cold (Cyan), Hot (Orange), Snacks (Pink).
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
